description:
KDE Frameworks 6.12 open-source software suite is now available with various bug fixex and improvements for Plasma desktop users. Here's what's changed!

The post KDE Frameworks 6.12 Released with Various Improvements and Bug Fixes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KDE Frameworks 6.12 Released with Various Improvements and Bug Fixes
